title.narrative: Second Community Development and Livelihood Improvement Project

description.narrative: To enhance quality of life of poor households of the most poor divisions in the country and increase incomes and well being of the poor and most vulnerable,.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Policy Planning, Economic Affairs, Child, Youth and Cultural Affairs

condition.narrative: GOSl and PIE to submit mid-term review of the project
PIE shall establish and maintaing thereafter througout the Project Implementation a grievance redressal system having TORs andstaffing acceptable to IDA
PIE shall finalize the annual plan and budget by Dec.31 each year
PIE shall prepare and adopt an information disclosure policy
PIE to carry out two evaluations of the readiness of Samurdhi Authority to implement the project and sustainability of VillageOrganizations and the federations to operate and maintain subprojects
PIE to establish by June 30, 2010 and thereafter maintain throughout project implementation a Village Rating System acceptable toIDA
PIE to submit a proposal on the implementing arrangements for the remaining project implementation period
PIU and GOSL to carry out an evaluation of the impact of first Phase and submit the findings of the impact evaluation to IDA
